channel.title: ZodiacsReign Newbie Edition V1.0 Pack
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9ithdl.png[/img] [center][IMG]http://i778.photobucket.com/albums/yy64/Femalescape/Newbie.png[/img] This pack is basically a edited release of ZodiacsReign Forever V.10 Pack. Before you screw at me, I have permission to do this. So I guess your wondering what's different about this one? Basically, you could call It the ultimate package for newbs. It will help them to start their own server, also providing various tools, programs, accessories and extras. You could say It's the equivalent of a super laggy control panel, although this pack isn't super laggy. [i][b][size=12pt]First of all, what is ZodiacsReign?[/size][/b][/i]
ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, ZodiacsReign has been around for almost 2 years and Z 0 D I A C has been updating for a very long time. In "ZodiacsReign Packages" you will find Tools, ID Lists, Essentials and more to make your private server experience better.
[i][b][size=12pt]So what have I done?[/size][/b][/i] [b]*[/b]Re-arranged everything [b]*[/b]Edited 50% and added some extras [b]*[/b]Put-together an excellent starter package [b]*[/b][i]Added and edited some law notes[/i] [b]*[/b]Made little tutorials for the "confusing" tools/programs [b]*[/b]Made it newb and advanced friendly You can also find a list of all the ZodiacsReign packages within one of the folders. Feel free to flame all you like, everyone has opinions, although I hope you find this package useful. I will be releasing later versions of ZodiacsReign Newbie Pack. If you are seriously annoyed, fuck off to another thread. Scan by Krackkid [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/15x03zs.png[/img] [i][b][url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=RBMYV8ZX][size=14pt]DOWNLOAD HERE[/size][/url][/b][/i] [i][b][size=12pt]Credits[/size][/b][/i] [u]>>[/u] [shadow=red,left]Z 0 D I A C[/shadow] and his affiliates [u]>>[/u] [shadow=purple,left],Kate[/shadow] [u]>>[/u] [shadow=blue,left]Krackkid[/shadow] [/center] Downloads; 99

item.title: ZodiacsReign Newbie Edition V1.0 Pack
item.dc:creator: @_Kate1 ,Kate
item.description:
@_Kate1 wrote:

[center]
[center]

This pack is basically a edited release of ZodiacsReign Forever V.10 Pack. Before you screw at me, I have permission to do this. So I guess your wondering what’s different about this one? Basically, you could call It the ultimate package for newbs. It will help them to start their own server, also providing various tools, programs, accessories and extras. You could say It’s the equivalent of a super laggy control panel, although this pack isn’t super laggy.

[size=12pt]First of all, what is ZodiacsReign?[/size]

ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, ZodiacsReign has been around for almost 2 years and Z 0 D I A C has been updating for a very long time. In "ZodiacsReign Packages" you will find Tools, ID Lists, Essentials and more to make your private server experience better.

[size=12pt]So what have I done?[/size]

*Re-arranged everything
*Edited 50% and added some extras
*Put-together an excellent starter package
*Added and edited some law notes
*Made little tutorials for the “confusing” tools/programs
*Made it newb and advanced friendly

You can also find a list of all the ZodiacsReign packages within one of the folders. Feel free to flame all you like, everyone has opinions, although I hope you find this package useful. I will be releasing later versions of ZodiacsReign Newbie Pack. If you are seriously annoyed, fuck off to another thread.

Scan by Krackkid

15x03zs.png750×568

[size=14pt]DOWNLOAD HERE[/size]

[size=12pt]Credits[/size]

>> [shadow=red,left]Z 0 D I A C[/shadow] and his affiliates
>> [shadow=purple,left],Kate[/shadow]
>> [shadow=blue,left]Krackkid[/shadow]
[/center]
